text: right Grimtooth's Traps is a 1981 role-playing game supplement published by Flying Buffalo. ==Contents== Grimtooth's Traps is a collection of traps selected from contributors. ==Reception== Aaron Allston reviewed Grimtooth's Traps in The Space Gamer No. 43. Allston commented that "I'd recommend this as one of the best supplements released this year - but use it sparingly, unless you have several Indiana Joneses in the party." Nicholas Dougan reviewed Grimtooth's Traps for White Dwarf #33, giving it an overall rating of 7 out of 10, and stated that "Although perhaps a little expensive, Grimtooth's Traps is none-the-less a demon-send for the referee who is always looking for that extra special trap for the next level. Be cautious, though: there is therein the potential for campaign destroying overkill." ==Reviews== *Different Worlds #14 (Sep 1981) ==References== Category:Fantasy role-playing game supplements
title: Grimtooth's Traps
